title: Abroad.
author: Coghill, J[ames] Henry. [from old catalog]
snippet: Here are the ruins of an old castle, once the residence of the Kings of Scotland Passing through" the Kyles, we entered Loch Fine, landed some passengers at Tarbet, at which place we had a glimpse of the remains of an old castle built by Robert Bruce, where he once I'ved.
